issue.title: Typo in category check (if statement)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Typo in category check (if statement):
\components\com_easysdi_catalog\controllers\metadata.php
and
\components\com_easysdi_catalog\libraries\easysdi\SearchJForm.php

```

is_null($caegories) -> is_null($categories)
```


**Fixed versions :** 4.4.4
